_header: Now these fowls singeth and maketh their bliss
Title(s): ‘Exemplum de beata Virgine et gaudiis eius’
Subjects: songs; Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; translations
_description: ‘Exemplum de beata Virgine et gaudiis eius’, a song in praise of the Virgin Mary — six quatrains, some couplets and some monorhyming

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Nu þis fules singet hand maket hure blisseand þat gres up
                    þringet and leued þe ris…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…I hered ibe þe time þat such chid uas
                    iborenþat lesed al of þine þat arre was for lore
CamTCC323.Attributed Title:
Exemplum de beata Virgine et gaudiis eius (f.
                    81v)
